version_description:
- Added option to date and contact filter
- Allow negative and zero tax value
- Added option to set web url in company info
- Added option to set customer to project
- Added option to easily change company
- Added option to convert Invoice to Credit Note
- Added search option in pdf settings
- Now you can search over task/product, name & description
- Many other improvements and bugs fixes
- Many other improvements and bugs fixes.

- Added option to upgrade from Moon Invoice.
- Many other improvements and bugs fixes.
- Many improvements and bugs fixes.

- New! Added new multi users sync option with Dropbox
- Support now up to 3 taxes
- Set default taxes per contact
- Redesign time entry screen
- Many improvements and bugs fixes

- New! Added new multi users sync option with Dropbox
- Support now up to 3 taxes
- Set default taxes per contact
- Redesign time entry screen
- Many improvements and bugs fixes

- New! Added new multi users sync option with Dropbox
- Support now up to 3 taxes
- Set default taxes per contact
- Redesign time entry screen
- Many improvements and bugs fixes

- NEW! Added login option to easy restore purchased
- NEW! Added Barcode scan support
- NEW! Added 3D Touch support for Timer
- NEW! Added more options for CSV export/import
- Improved product stock management
- Added currency option for product
- Many improvements and bug fixes

- NEW! Added login option to easy restore purchased
- NEW! Added Barcode scan support
- NEW! Added 3D Touch support for Timer
- NEW! Added more options for CSV export/import
- Improved product stock management
- Added currency option for product
- Many improvements and bug fixes

- NEW! Added login option to easy restore purchased
- NEW! Added Barcode scan support
- NEW! Added 3D Touch support for Timer
- NEW! Added more options for CSV export/import
- Improved product stock management
- Added currency option for product
- Many improvements and bug fixes

- NEW! Customize PDF with different font and size
- NEW! Customize email with different font and size
- NEW! Start use of all features without paying full price with subscription
- NEW! Get discount and easy purchase with combo purchase for iOS and OSX apps
- NEW! Added bank details under company & option to include in invoice pdf
- NEW! Sales report by task
- NEW! Option to hide currency code 
- NEW! Show/hide task/service and product section as per your usage
- NEW! Option to add shipping cost into purchase order
- NEW! Now add Inline customer
- NEW! Filter product by item code when import products from CSV
- NEW! Deposit option
- NEW! Separate language selection for number format
- NEW! Added more filter options in Time Logs
- Updated Dropbox framework
- Major bugs fixed and lot’s of improvements

Create FREE unlimited invoices for freelancers, small business owners, and contractors
• iOS 13 compatible
• Customize application settings, PDF settings and application title company wise
• New design to easily edit invoice, estimate, PO, etc. for optimum user experience
• View address on Map
• 2 new styles in the invoice for item/task line
• Now access settings and app settings directly from the invoice screen to edit

Fixes & Improvements:
• Minor bug fixes and lots of improvements.
• Improved performance for the express user-centric experience.
